name: Meta Cloth
description: "You can customize your T-shirt with cryptocurrency here Of course, this T-shirt can be tried on in your meta universe image. In addition, we may also issue you a real T-shirt. In meta-universe, every citizen needs to wear clothing, and needs clothing with different scenes, such as sportswear, casual wear, beachwear, and so on. ​We are an autonomous community that provides costumes for the residents of Meta Universe. Our projects include: ​community building, ​clothing design, ​NFT design, ​NFT trading, ​SWAP, ​pledge mining, ​games"
